Package math3d

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Plane
    An immutable plane in 3d space.
    Polygon
    A polygon with 3 or more vertices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvexPolygon
    A polygon implementation for convex polygons.
    Direction3
    A direction in 3d space.
    Polygon.Vertex
    A polygon vertex with a normal vector.
    Rotation3
    A rotation in 3d space.
    Triangle
    A Polygon with 3 vertices.
    Vector2
    A 2-dimensional vector.
    Vector3
    A 3-dimensional vector.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Polygon.PolygonType
    Specifies the number of sides of the polygon.
    Polygon.VertexOrder
    Specifies the order of the vertices in the polygon, assuming you are looking towards the front of the polygon.
